snapshotId.description: Snapshot ID of the iceberg table

filter.description: Filter used to scan the iceberg table

schemaId.description: Schema ID of the iceberg table

projectedFieldNames.description: List of field names that are projected from the iceberg table

totalPlanningDuration.description: Duration of the scan in MILLISECONDS

resultDataFiles.description: List of data files that are read during the scan

resultDeleteFiles.description: List of delete files that are read during the scan

totalDataManifests.description: Total number of manifests that are scanned during the scan

totalDeleteManifests.description: Total number of delete manifests that are scanned during the scan

scannedDataManifests.description: Number of data manifests that are scanned during the scan

skippedDataManifests.description: Number of data manifests that are skipped during the scan

totalFileSizeInBytes.description: Total file size in bytes that are read during the scan

totalDeleteFileSizeInBytes.description: Total delete file size in bytes that are read during the scan

skippedDataFiles.description: Number of data files that are skipped during the scan

skippedDeleteFiles.description: Number of delete files that are skipped during the scan

scannedDeleteManifests.description: Number of delete manifests that are scanned during the scan

skippedDeleteManifests.description: Number of delete manifests that are skipped during the scan

indexedDeleteFiles.description: Number of delete files that are indexed during the scan

equalityDeleteFiles.description: Number of delete files that are equality indexed during the scan

positionalDeleteFiles.description: Number of delete files that are positional indexed during the scan
